description: The applications that support AFPACKAGE files are alternatives to more popular apps. For example, Affinity Publisher is a desktop publishing alternative to Adobe InDesign , Affinity Designer is a vector image editing alternative to Adobe Illustrator , and Affinity Photo is a raster image editing alternative to Adobe Photoshop .

Affinity document files often contain links to images and other assets in a project. To preserve links and images in the document, you can save the project as an AFPACKAGE file. To save a document as a package, select File â†’ Save As Package... from the Affinity application menu bar. When saving the file, you can also choose the fonts and images included in the package.
